name: R4B-Observation-R5-Observation
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Observation into FHIR R5

target.comment: R4B `Observation` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation`
R4B `Observation.basedOn` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.basedOn`
R4B `Observation.bodySite` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.bodySite`
R4B `Observation.category` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.category`
R4B `Observation.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.code`
R4B `Observation.component` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.component`
R4B `Observation.component.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.component.code`

element.display: Why the component result is missing

target.display: Why the component result is missing
target.comment: R4B `Observation.component.dataAbsentReason` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.component.dataAbsentReason`

R4B `Observation.component.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Observation.component.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Observation.component.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.component.id`
R4B `Observation.component.interpretation` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.component.interpretation`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Observation.component.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Observation.component.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Provides guide for interpretation of component result

target.display: Provides guide for interpretation of component result
target.comment: R4B `Observation.component.referenceRange` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.component.referenceRange`

R4B `Observation.component.value[x]` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Observation.component.value[x]` - value[x] has change due to type change: R4B `value[x]` `Ratio` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `value[x]`
R4B `Observation.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.contained`
R4B `Observation.dataAbsentReason` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.dataAbsentReason`

element.display: Related measurements the observation is made from

target.display: Related resource from which the observation is made
target.comment: R4B `Observation.derivedFrom` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Observation.derivedFrom` - derivedFrom has change due to type change: R4B `derivedFrom` `Reference` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `derivedFrom`

target.display: A reference to the device that generates the measurements or the device settings for the device
target.comment: R4B `Observation.device` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.device`
R4B `Observation.effective[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.effective[x]`

element.display: Healthcare event during which this observation is made

target.display: Healthcare event during which this observation is made
target.comment: R4B `Observation.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.encounter`
R4B `Observation.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Observation.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: What the observation is about, when it is not about the subject of record

target.display: What the observation is about, when it is not about the subject of record
target.comment: R4B `Observation.focus` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.focus`

element.display: Related resource that belongs to the Observation group

target.display: Related resource that belongs to the Observation group
target.comment: R4B `Observation.hasMember` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.hasMember`
R4B `Observation.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.id`
R4B `Observation.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `Observation.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.implicitRules`
R4B `Observation.interpretation` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.interpretation`

element.display: Date/Time this version was made available

target.display: Date/Time this version was made available
target.comment: R4B `Observation.issued` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.issued`
R4B `Observation.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Observation.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `Observation.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.meta`
R4B `Observation.method` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.method`

R4B `Observation.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Observation.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Observation.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Observation.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`

R4B `Observation.partOf` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Observation.partOf` - partOf has change due to type change: R4B `partOf` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `partOf`

element.display: Who is responsible for the observation

target.display: Who is responsible for the observation
target.comment: R4B `Observation.performer` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.performer`
R4B `Observation.referenceRange` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.referenceRange`
R4B `Observation.referenceRange.age` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.referenceRange.age`
R4B `Observation.referenceRange.appliesTo` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.referenceRange.appliesTo`

R4B `Observation.referenceRange.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Observation.referenceRange.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Observation.referenceRange.high` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.referenceRange.high`
R4B `Observation.referenceRange.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.referenceRange.id`
R4B `Observation.referenceRange.low` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.referenceRange.low`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Observation.referenceRange.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Observation.referenceRange.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Text based reference range in an observation

target.display: Text based reference range in an observation
target.comment: R4B `Observation.referenceRange.text` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `Observation.referenceRange.text` - text has change due to type change: R4B text string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 text
R4B `Observation.referenceRange.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.referenceRange.type`

R4B `Observation.specimen` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Observation.specimen` - specimen has change due to type change: R4B `specimen` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `specimen`

R4B `Observation.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/observation-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/observation-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Who and/or what the observation is about

target.display: Who and/or what the observation is about
target.comment: R4B `Observation.subject` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Observation.subject` - subject has change due to type change: R4B `subject` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `Observation.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Observation.text`

R4B `Observation.value[x]` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Observation.value[x]` - value[x] has change due to type change: R4B `value[x]` `Ratio` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `value[x]`
